pages.text: $(key)Target Dummies$() let you test combat performance. $(bold)Right-click$() a block to place one, and $(bold)left-click$() with an $(bold)empty hand$() to remove it.$(br2)Equip it with armor or gear by $(bold)right-clicking$() with the item. To unequip, $(bold)right-click$() the matching body part with an $(bold)empty hand$().
